# The `SmallString` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a> is just a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> with methods and accessors that make it work better as a string (e.g. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString</a> is just a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector</a> with methods and accessors that make it work better as a string (e.g.

operator+ etc).

Definition at line 26 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallstring-h">SmallString.h</a>.

### compare&#95;insensitive {#ac66bfad9caed191bc784a03cf248ef0c}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;unsigned InternalLen&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>int llvm::SmallString&lt; InternalLen &gt;::compare&#95;insensitive (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RHS) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "nodiscard"]}>
compare&#95;insensitive - Compare two strings, ignoring case.

### slice {#a7c3a261582207f6db4cd6d83732e9ac0}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;unsigned InternalLen&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>StringRef llvm::SmallString&lt; InternalLen &gt;::slice (size&#95;t Start, size&#95;t End) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "nodiscard"]}>
Return a reference to the substring from &#91;Start, End).

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Start">The index of the starting character in the substring; if the index is npos or greater than the length of the string then the empty substring will be returned.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="End">The index following the last character to include in the substring. If this is npos, or less than <code>Start</code>, or exceeds the number of characters remaining in the string, the string suffix (starting with <code>Start</code>) will be returned.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallstring-h/#l00247">247</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallstring-h">SmallString.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### substr {#abab69c8e9372f6a5283db4a059b8d5a0}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;unsigned InternalLen&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>StringRef llvm::SmallString&lt; InternalLen &gt;::substr (size&#95;t Start, size&#95;t N=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#ad0f54a163ac500b144590640c6f1eb6b">StringRef::npos</a>) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "nodiscard"]}>
Return a reference to the substring from &#91;Start, Start + N).

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Start">The index of the starting character in the substring; if the index is npos or greater than the length of the string then the empty substring will be returned.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="N">The number of characters to included in the substring. If <code>N</code> exceeds the number of characters remaining in the string, the string suffix (starting with <code>Start</code>) will be returned.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
